column16: If language is used as an L2 ("Language Use" field), put a note about this in the "used_as_L2" column.
If there is no information about L2 in the "Language Use" field, put "no information" so that we know
that the language has been checked.
Any other interesting notes (such as about semispeakers or number of L1 speakers), put in the "notes" column.

column15: Intermarry with Garrwa [wrk] or Mara [mec]. Wives learn the husband’s language but use their own with members of their own group. Children usually speak the mother’s language, but boys at puberty learn and then speak the father’s language.
